question: 天候
sourceMnemonic:
<kanji>Heaven</kanji>'s <kanji>climate</kanji> is <vocabulary>the weather</vocabulary>.

Compared to <ja>天気</ja>, this is a more formal term used to describe the weather over the period of one day, multiple days, or even weeks.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
